column2: Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Objective one, Rozenburg, is now cleared. Over.
Papa Bear, Papa Bear, this is Alpha One. Supply convoy now destroyed. Over.
Alpha Black calling Bravo dustoff. We're done here, requesting extract. Over.
Bravo pilot here. Alpha, get your men ready for a fast-rope descent to the LZ. Bravo out.
Air team Bravo to Alpha. We copy you, on our way. Out.
This is Bravo, we're overhead, get ready for extraction. Over.
Liftoff. Alpha, we're going home. Bravo out.
Papa Bear to Alpha Black. Read you loud and clear. Rozenburg objective complete. Dig in and wait for the convoy. Out.
Papa Bear to Alpha Black. Copy that, convoy is burnt toast. Now get out of there. Come to Papa. Out.
Alpha One, this is Papa. Welcome home, you guys are swell. Mission accomplished. Out.
Gross, Ranger, at US Army Base.
